column4: guys I mistakenyl deleted Pictures, Downloads, Documents.... special folders under my Home, how can I restore them? they were empty..
they'll probably be restored when you login again or just right click -> create directory yourself...
their icons do not come back.
hmm I am not sure about the names. ie. what is normal name for PUBLICSHARE
what services do you want to stop?
if they use upstart, then you won't do it this way (check if there's a file in /etc/init).  If they're still using sysv init scripts, then just use sysv-rc-conf for example
I can start them manually later. it wont be a problem. just wondering where is the setting.
